alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kleberg County through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ricardo, or near Kingsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ricardo. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 698 and 704. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
